nse_queries.observation:
On page no. 1, the disclosure mentions: 'shall have no obligation to keep it
               confidential if'. Kindly provide: (a) quantified rationale (₹/% impact on revenue/profitability expected in next 3 years); (b) concrete timeline with milestones; (c) capital allocation and source of funds; and (d) a corresponding Risk Factor if execution depends on market conditions or regulatory approvals. Provide revised draft.
On page no. 3, acronym(s) 'VIII' appear without definition. Kindly provide full form on first occurrence or in glossary/abbreviations section. Provide revised draft.
On page no. 4, acronym(s) 'IN' appear without definition. Kindly provide full form on first occurrence or in glossary/abbreviations section. Provide revised draft.

Refer to financial section of the DRHP and provide/include details of breakup of industry-wise revenue from operations split for the DRHP period (e.g., Automotive, Appliances, Industrial, etc.). Provide this in tabular format showing ₹ and % contribution for past 3 FYs and stub period.
Incorporate the details of country wise import purchases value and % terms for the DRHP period. Provide revised draft.
Refer page 168 include the row of total in all tables. Ensure all financial tables throughout the DRHP include a 'Total' row/column for arithmetic accuracy.

Refer to the trademark details in business chapter, kindly include the registration number, registration date, and validity period details for all trademarks in the DRHP. Provide this in tabular format showing: (a) Trademark name; (b) Class; (c) Registration No.; (d) Registration date; (e) Validity till; and (f) Territory. Provide revised draft.

Refer to the property section on page 2, kindly include the area details (i.e. sq.ft., sq. meters, acres etc.) for all properties (owned and leased). Provide this in the property table along with: (a) built-up area; (b) land area; (c) unit of measurement; and (d) usage (manufacturing/office/warehouse). Provide revised draft.

Refer to manufacturing process details, include the details of scrap and wastages details. Quantify the scrap generation %, wastage %, and yield loss analysis for the past 3 FYs. Provide the draft and incorporate the same in DRHP.

Regarding agreements (e.g. lease, purchase, sales), confirm they are not prejudicial to the interest of the Issuer. Explicitly confirm they are at arm's length. If any agreement is not at arm's length, disclose the justification and Audit Committee approval. Provide revised draft.

Kindly disclose the detailed logistics mechanism followed by the Company. Explain the flow of goods from Factory -> Depot/Warehouse -> Dealer/Distributor -> Retailer. Clarify who bears the freight/transportation risk at each leg (Company or Customer). Provide revised draft.

Kindly include a detailed business process flowchart covering the entire value chain from Raw Material Procurement to Finished Goods Dispatch. Ensure key control points and quality checks are highlighted in the flowchart. Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide the Attrition Rate (%) for the last 3 financial years, split between Senior Management and Junior Staff/Workers. Also confirm whether the Company is fully compliant with EPF and ESIC payments for all eligible employees (including contract labour). Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide a table showing total insurance cover vis-a-vis total value of assets (Property, Plant & Equipment + Inventory). Quantify the % of assets covered implies adequacy. Disclose details of any insurance claims rejected in the last 3 years. Provide revised draft.

Kindly provide details of CSR obligations vs actual CSR spend for the last 3 financial years. Confirm if the Company meets the 2% average net profit criteria. If there is any shortfall/unspent amount, provide reasons and details of transfer to specified funds. Provide revised draft.

Kindly format the revenue disclosure to explicitly show 'State-wise Revenue Bifurcation' for top 10 states for the last 3 financial years. Ensure this reconciles with GST returns data. Provide revised draft.
